metadata.description: The most evil warrior following the devils, it turned into a swordsman form wandering. It is said that it is an entity that gathers thousands of dead souls, having a very high attack. Avoid it!

A senior dragon which whole body is green. The most notable part is the fatal hammer tail. It has no interest in money or jewelleries themselves, but its biggest hobby is collecting golden things. It is said that there are countless gold and coins buried in its nest. But the adventurers who planned to gain them always came back empty-handed and even got killed!

Originated in the pyramid, it was originally an ancient king's burial object. However, Due to too many tomb robbers, the evil spirits were released from the treasure chest to attack the robbers. Don't touch anything you shouldn't take, Or you will hardly wish to live!

The greatest leader recognized by the Orcs, commanding the entire Orc tribe. Don't be fooled by his rough appearance, he has excellent combat power. All the enemies who had underestimated him have been wiped out!

card_data.name: Orc Lord Helm Card
card_data.effect: When suffering Atk from close enemy, Caster has a 5% chance to reflect 100% Dmg

metadata.description: Serving the devil before its death, it used evil techniques to experiment on various humans for worship. It can't rest in peace for a long time after death, it was transformed into an immortal body by the devil to continue its evil actions. It was often bullied by other monsters in Glast Heim. A real death may be a relief for it...

card_data.name: Injustice Card
card_data.effect: auto attack has a 3% chance to trigger [Sonic Blow] Lv.5

metadata.description: One of the absolutely strong ones in the wolves. It's very easygoing usually. It's obsessed with fighting and becoming the strongest one. It's looking forward to the emergence of an opponent that matches its fighting power!

card_data.name: Atroce Card
card_data.effect: auto attack has a 5% chance to trigger amazing speed (Attack Spd ＋20%; this effect lasts 10 seconds)

metadata.description: There is a fatal danger lurking under her sexy and enchanting appearance. Although her evil kiss will make people intoxicated and unable to extricate themselves, the evil horn on the head and the Devil Wings behind her prove that her purpose is to devour the soul of enemy!
The most authoritative existence in Kobolds. Previously it had a dispute with the Goblins for the territory, and finally it defeated the Goblin elite team alone. Its combat power is amazing!

card_data.name: Kobold Leader Card
card_data.effect: Melee single target skill has 5% lifesteal

metadata.description: An egg hatched by the dragons, which shell is very hard. Although the dragons are too strong, Their fertility is weak. If you a dragon monster sees you destroying the dragon egg, You will face the anger and chase of all dragons. Think twice before you do this!

Although it is only a large group of mud with consciousness, it has its own dreams and pursuits and hopes that one day it can leave the dark and humid environment of the sewer, and perch and have fun in the nature with the sunshine and forests... If anyone dares to question its daydream, there will be no good end!

There is a fatal danger lurking under his handsome appearance. Although his evil rose will make people emotionally involved and unable to forget it, the evil horn on the head and the Devil Wings behind him prove that his purpose is to devour the soul of enemy!

Before his death, he fought throughout the battlefield, after his death, he is still in a fighting mood and becomes a horrible knight from the abyss, faithfully guarding Glast Heim, being ruthless and cruel to all invaders. It is said that after understanding the totem engraved on the banner he carries, endless power can be gained...

It's said that it was evolved from an ancient gargoyle. It's a humanoid creature with bat wings. It's very afraid of the sun, always staying under earth all the year round and attacking passers-by with arrows. Its archery is superb, and if you meet it, be careful!

card_data.name: Gargoyle Card
card_data.effect: When insect monsters are skilled, caster has a 3% chance to increase moving speed by 25%; the effect lasts 20 seconds.

metadata.description: A mysterious and grotesque monster, Usually pretending to be a shrub on the side of the road. And when the preys are careless, it uses its poison needles to attack them. In recent years, the Rafflesia were rarer to be seen, and it was once considered to be extinct.

Legend has it that he was a powerful archer before death. After his death, since he was eager to fight, his soul was attached to the armor and took up arms to continue fighting. Because of his strong resentment, he attacks anyone he sees. Don't provoke him and please Flee quickly after seeing him!

card_data.name: Raydric Archer Card
card_data.effect: When insect monsters are skilled, Caster has a 10% chance to increase Refine Atk for a certain period; the effect can stack up 3 times.

metadata.description: It has a extremely strong resentment and terrible destructive energy. Because it has no physical form, and its cloak has a stealth effect, it can easily disappear in front of the enemy. Its favorite thing to do is to use its big mouth on the chest to swallow the enemy and drag the enemy soul into the endless abyss...

card_data.name: Wraith Card
card_data.effect: When undead monsters are skilled, caster has a 3% chance to restore HP equal to 9% damage

metadata.description: The cousin of Tarou in the capital sewer, which has experienced a mutation in Glast Heim. Under its blue fur, There is a heart that longs for light and freedom. Don't underestimate this cute creature, Its speed and attack after the mutation are unpredictable!

It is mutated from a fly and has a good attack. Small but powerful, With rich combat experience, it is definitely a veteran of the flies. In addition to buzz, Its pet phrase is, "I am small, but I am very gentle..."

card_data.name: Hunter Fly Card
card_data.effect: When using physical skills, Caster has 3% chance to restore 2% of Max HP
